EmailTemplate.name: 202001_Americas_Event_Helicopter-Happy-Hour_amr.Confirmation Email
EmailTemplate.subject: [Registration Confirmed] {{my.Event Name:default=edit me}}, {{my.Event Date:default=edit me}}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Thank you for registering for the Honeywell Helicopter Social. We'd like to confirm that you have successfully registered for the following event:
Event: {{my.Event Name:default=edit me}}
Date: {{my.Event Date:default=edit me}} {{my.Add to Calendar:default=edit me}}
Location: {{my.Event Location:default=edit me}} 2:00 p.m. – 5:00 p.m. PST
We look forward to meeting you!
Sincerely,
Honeywell Aerospace Event Team
